Contributor: Straker Brothers Limited, printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Poster No. 66." Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that trained men are what in the end will win the war and that it is your duty to become one. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 66.
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: What in the end will settle this war?
